document.full_text: thousands of shiite protesters rallied in several cities in a show of shiite solidarity against the sunni ruling class of bahrain that has unleashed a brutal crackdown on shiite protesters.
document.title: iraqi shiites protest bahrain crackdown
lines_and_colors: thousands of shiite protesters rallied in several cities in a show of shiite solidarity against the sunni ruling class of bahrain that has unleashed a brutal crackdown on shiite protesters.
